website_summaries.verdict: A sweet and cuddly way to introduce a small child to dinosaurs, and its companion volcano makes cleaning up after prehistoric playtime a breeze.
pros: Includes 5 plush dinosaurs and fabric volcano
Volcano doubles as dinosaur storage with carrying handle
cons: Best for the youngest dinosaur fans

customer_reviews.title: Beware, I didn't receive the 5 different dinosaurs as shown!
customer_reviews.text: The animals are soft and cute but as you can tell from the photo, I got duplicates of two of them and didn't receive the blue or the grey dinosaur. So if you are counting on getting 5 different dinosaurs, buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I read the description many times to make ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I read the description many times to make sure it was 5 dinos amd the cave. And it wasnt super small. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: crafting

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not the quality I expected given the price
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this and so do I! We received it yesterday and I’m already concerned about the quality. Lots of exposed/loose seams (see picture). Very disappointed since this was not cheap! I was hoping the quality would have been a bit better given the price. Hopefully they will hold up, but my son is a chewer so only time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These dinosaurs are awesome!! My 2yo loves anything dinosaur related and these are a hit. They're small enough for her to take everywhere, but still big enough for us to actively play with. I will probably buy a couple more for my nieces and nephews. I am so impressed with the quality and reasonable price. I wish there was an option for even more dinos because I sure would snatch em up! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Zach, but most likely Kim

customer_reviews.title: It's great! They use their imagination instead of watching videos, they can actually play.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old granddaughter. She's obsessed with dinosaurs. She loves it and totes it like a purse. She'll dangle it by the by the handy loop and yell "dinosaurs!" and roar. It's adorable. I recommend this to anyone who has young ones. The dinosaurs are excellent and a good size, all about the size of a beany baby. It's fun to watch her little imagination bloom. She also stuffs her other small toys in there as well. She loves it and your little darling will love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Erskine

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this set!
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the fence about purchasing this set, don't hesitate. Our kids are OBSESSED and I love the quality. They even wash well, as we've had to toss them in the washing machine a few times. The volcano is just the cherry on top. Prextex also sells another dinosaur set that we recently bought for our 18 month old and he LOVES them, too! They are the perfect size, and I just use a permanent marker to write who's is who's on the dinosaur's tag, and the tag is a real tag not just a crappy one that I would normally cut off. So soft and precious.
customer_reviews.author: Three Little Kittens

customer_reviews.title: My Kindergarten Son Absolutely LOVES this toy!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my five year old dino-lover's birthday and it has quickly become one of his favorite toys! The volcano is a GREAT size! Just over a foot tall, with a 5 "beanie-baby" sized dinosaurs inside that are very well made. I was a little hesitant about the price, but in hindsight, it was well worth every penny! A great quality toy that is cute and fun for any young child that loves dinosaurs. I would give this product more than five stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur Volcano!
customer_reviews.text: This volcano set was a lot larger than I anticipated. It is so much fun! The dinosaurs are about standard beanie baby size. The volcano holds all of them easily. My son often adds more Schleich dinosaurs inside the volcano and they all fit. The dinosaurs themselves aren’t overly detailed, but they are still a lot of fun. The volcano isn’t great for carrying around. It does have a loop on top, but it doesn’t make a great bag. But it is fun to play with the dinosaurs in and around the volcano!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Jane

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for my two girls (ages 2 and 4.5) who have been really into The Land Before Time lately. They normally play with all of my husband's old dinosaur toys that are big and plastic, but I thought these would be awesome for them especially because they are soft and snuggly! I especially love the little mountain carrying case they come in -- it's super cool to play with, a really great way to store them, and fun to carry around! My girls love these so much! They are good quality and great as bedtime snugglers! I'm very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Britni

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaurs rule!
customer_reviews.text: This is a super cute toy- welcomed by my 2.5 year old toddler granddaughter with much delight. Her little hands easily opened and retrieved the soft dinosaur toys from inside the volcano. This will provide her many more hours of imaginative play with the fun part being able to put the dinosaurs in and out of the volcano home over and over. Who doesn’t love that? Delivery was fast too!
customer_reviews.author: two roads healing

customer_reviews.title: Best dinosaurs to cuddle up with!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dinosaur loving 5 year old nephew. He was so excited for the volcano and super stoked when he saw the zipper that opened it up to reveal five dinosaurs!! They are perfect for him to sleep with since the regular Dino toys are mostly hard and pointy plastic that make for uncomfortable sleeping partners. That is why I ordered these for him and he sleeps with them all of the time and puts them back into the volcano in the morning before going to school. Great toy for dinosaur lovers with a nice holder for easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: T.I.M

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, totable Dinos!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son on his third birthday because he loves dinosaurs and to throw things. As soon as he got them out they went into the air so it was a good buy right out of the volcano. lol He plays with them every day and carries them around all over the place. He learned the word “adorable” because they really are! At night he puts them into their volcano for bed, and wakes them in the morning. Very sweet! These are such a hit we are getting him the 8 count dinos for Christmas. 🦕
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toy for Dinosaur-Obsessed Toddler
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was gifted the big cats version of this product a few years ago and she still plays with it. My son loved it so much, he always tried to sneak it out of her room. When I decided to buy him his own, I came across the dinosaur version and knew I had to buy it for him for his third birthday. He LOVES it! He’s had it now for three months and still plays with it almost daily. His favorite activity is imaginative play with the dinosaurs and we’ve incorporated different kinds of fun counting games as well. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's new favorite. I'll admit, The volcano is a little funny looking, but the plush dinosaurs in it are great! There's 5 or 6 of them and they're a good size too, not miniature. Good quality. WELL worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 23month old nephew for Christmas. He was delighted take each one out. He held one in each hand for awhile and kept taking them in and out. So toddler approved. ✔my brother thought it was a neat concept and was really excited about these for his son. So parent approved ✔ From my perspective a great toy or really 5 in 1. The dinosaurs are each unique. My personal favorite was the yellow one. They seem to be sturdy little toys. Perfectly sized for toddler hands.
customer_reviews.author: J$

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Dinosaur Volcano House with Dinosaurs was a great gift. My 5 year old grandson loved it. He knew it was recommended for younger kids but he has loved playing with them (and sneaking them into his bed to cuddle with at night). I was hesitant to buy them but they are a nice size and nicely made plus a lot of fun for our grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These little plush dinosaurs are so great! My almost 3 year old is obsessed with dinosaurs right now but the "big kid" toys are scary and hard plastic. Finding these Pretex ones were a godsend. They are accurate so good for learning, good-scary enough with roaring mouth and "sharp" teeth so my son thinks they're fierce, but also totally soft and snuggly. He plays all day with them and sleeps with them at night too! (And an added bonus for parents: super affordable, and supports a small company not a big box store!) I would highly recommend for the toddler/preschooler dinosaur enthusiast!!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Land

customer_reviews.title: Great gift especially for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I am currently giving this product 5 stars. I purchased this for my grandson and i will be giving it to him on Christmas day. The reason for the current 5 star rating is based on how it arrived and how everything looked when I opened it. I hope to have more feedback after this gift is given and played with. Everything seemed to be well made. Very pleased so far and would purchase more products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Andy's Angel

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: This item exceeded expectations. The plush toy dinosaurs are designed well and the material is very soft and the colors rich. The "volcano" has a cute stone pattern and is soft to the touch but stands up on its own due to the supporting material inside. The zipper on the volcano piece moves easily. It is roomy enough for all the toys to fit without being squished. The loop handle on the top is a great idea so that tots can easily carry it around. Overall, well designed and very nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Quality child friendly gift.
customer_reviews.text: The Prextex Dinosaur Volcano House with 5 Plush Dinosaurs was a big hit with the granddaughter at Christmas. According to her father, she was "obsessed" with this product and was seen carrying it with her everywhere after removing the gift wrapping. It appears to be a quality child friendly toy. The volcano house as well as the 5 dinosaurs contained inside are well made and very plush. After an evening of playing with this set, all of the items were still in pristine condition. Thank you Pretex and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: DMH

customer_reviews.title: WHAT AN OUTSTANDING DINOSAUR SET!
customer_reviews.text: My soon-to-be 2 year old grandson is into dinosaurs so I went on a dinosaur hunt for his birthday present and discovered this set. While I never realized dinosaurs lived in volcanoes (no wonder they are extinct), the volcano provides the perfect carrier to house and contain these fierce little cuties. The stone-like textured volcano material is various shades of brown (cameo). The dinosaurs are well made and, even though their tag says they contain pellets, I cannot feel any so they are soft, cuddly, and a nice size for little hands. I know this set is going to be a playtime favorite for a very long time. I would (and will) buy this set again.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Most Adorable Kid's Gift Ever
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter received one of these for a birthday gift, and I loved it so much I ordered it for a friend's child. The utter delight with which those baby dinosaurs were greeted as they tumbled from the volcano was the cutest thing ever. The dinosaurs appear very well made, they are so distinct from one another and the volcano keeps them all in one place. LOVE this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Absolute hit with my 2.5yr old! I got this for him because a 2yr old boy that I babysit regularly has this set. They both play with it daily and I'm glad I decided to get a set for my house. They love the different kinds of dinosaurs & the volcano house to put them in! I was worried we would get 2 of the same color/type of dino like some reviews saud. But we got all 5 variety set!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mae Green

customer_reviews.title: Oh so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I will try to remember to add a picture to this review. This is a great present for my son. He loves dinosaurs! We've bought some other toys from this brand too. They were horses in a barn and they were awesome. Years later, we play with those horses more than any other toy and I bet these dinos will be just as popular!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dinosaur lovers of any age
customer_reviews.text: Very charming collection of little plushie dinosaurs. Just the right size for a young child (or adult who has never grown up). They're so very soft, and what a kewl idea to make the soft carrying case look like a volcano. My only problem is that I'll have to share this with the kids. :-)
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: A Winning Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This gift was definitely a win! Gave it to my 1 year old nephew, who continued to carry the volcano around and roar at people. It was terrifying (actually adorable)! He loved it! The case is soft and all the Dino’s zip up nicely. The quality is great and I definitely recommend this as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: South Dakota Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Dinos in their own carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the other green cave thingy with the small dinosaurs bc this one is much softer AND you can actually carry your little dinos in this without losing them. I had to purchase a second one for my other son. The dinos are super cute and soft also. My boys are 3 and 5 and love these to carry around with them. The brown cave is ample and the zipper is decent quality and doesn't stick allowing my boys to open and close it themselves. LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: handj

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this playset for my 2.5 year old dinosaur crazy grandson for Christmas. He loves it! He’s just learned zippers so the zipper door on the volcano was fun for him to open and close and put the little dinosaurs in to go night-night. The set is absolutely adorable. I love that the volcano is sturdy and the dinosaurs are so soft and the colors are bright. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Abby G.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived creased
customer_reviews.text: The "cave" container material is a semi-rigid fabric - once it is folded, it permanently creases. This is really unfortunately at face value. However, it is even worse when the product is shipped in a too small box, meaning it COMES with a fold (and, by extension, permanent crease).
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters enthralled!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughters had been enjoying their mom's Playskool dinosaurs that I saved from the 90's. But these soft and huggable dinos are a HUGE hit. I ordered both the cave in the hill and the volcano with a play mat. The girls decided the "mean" dinos live in the volcano while the "nice" dinos have the cave. Easy to fill with the dinos and so easy to transport. They even come to bed with them at our house! Lily especially appreciated the pterosaur, flying dinosaur. Yes, I keep them here because I enjoy playing dinosaurs too. quality is great and very prompt with the order. Highly, highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan J. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler dino lovers
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for a year now, and it's still a hit with my 3 year old. The volcano has held up nicely, there are no tears in the seams, and the zipper still works fine. It holds all of the stuffed dinos easily, and can be carried around with the little loop tag on top. As a 2 year old there was a little frustration with zipping it up, but he learned how to do it on his own eventually. Now he carries all kinds of dinos in there.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old nephew loves dinosaurs and this item did not disappoint this Christmas. He loves the movie with the dinos running from the lava from the volcano. So I thought this would be perfect. It also doubles as additional storage for toys. It is small but easy for him to carry around. Makes a great pillow too when full of the plush dinos.
customer_reviews.author: passionpersonified

customer_reviews.title: Quality toy, Great Seller
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's favorite toy, he takes the dinosaurs to bed with him and shows everyone his dinosaur house, just wish it had a pterodactyl as well to match the Land Before Time characters. High quality, stuffed, not beans, which is great. We left his favorite dinosaur on the plane while traveling, I contacted the seller and they shipped me out a replacement that same day!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yo really loves dinosaurs and adores this playset! He plays with them every time he enters the family room. We use them to count, talk about their features and distinguish them by color and even compare them to some of him favorite cartoon dinosaurs (Littlefoot and Cera). But mainly he enjoy playing with them by himself-But, I’ve finally convinced him to share 1 with his little sister😊 Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Fairest1ofall

customer_reviews.title: Buy this adorable toy!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at this for the past year or so and always bought something else for my kids. I finally got it as a gift for my two-year-old and I'm so glad! I can tell it is going to be a beloved toy! The dinos are cute and soft; there's enough space in the volcano for additional toys. Quality seems good. My kids are using their imagination so much with this thing.
customer_reviews.author: VileEvilCat

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, super cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so thrilled to get this as a gift from us before a big road trip. She loves to put her dinosaurs in their “house.” Very cute carrying case and we love the loop on the top so she can carry it in her little hand and tote her dinosaurs around. Very light weight so easy for a toddler to carry . All the dinosaurs and stitching etc. is good quality. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and encourages the imagination
customer_reviews.text: The Dinosaur Volcano House is awesome. I would have loved this as a child. I love it as an adult. First of all it's dinosaurs!!! It's very soft, colorful, great size for small hands and it has a loop at top that allows for easy carrying if you want to take it along.
customer_reviews.author: MPW

customer_reviews.title: Cute Volcano House for Dinos
customer_reviews.text: I bought this adorable volcano house for my 2 year old nephew...doing dinosaur-themed gifts this Christmas! The volcano and the plush five animals are well-made and seem to be very durable. I was a little worried as I had seen this same item from another company that many reviews said was cheap-looking, zipper not working, and not well-made. This one purchased here from Prextex is not. I am very pleased, fast shipping too. My nephew will love it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bell

customer_reviews.title: His reaction when opening the gift was priceless
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson's 4th birthday and wrapped each dinosaur separately in tissue paper inside the volcano so he would have more "presents" to open. He was so excited he was shaking as he opened.the gifts. His reaction upon opening the gift was priceless. Everything was well made and having the little handle to carry it around makes it more special.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute product but beware if it to be a gift. It doesn't come in any kind of box , just in a plastic bag crammed into the shipping box. It's a good size and the animals inside are pretty nice. I now have to find something to put it in to give as a gift. Overall pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob O.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small hands
customer_reviews.text: Adorable dinosaurs in a great storage case. Soft and colorful. Perfect size for small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Shop Girl

customer_reviews.title: Cute, safe dinosaur set for little ones
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the Dinosaur Volcano house. Bought it for my granddaughter, because she loves dinosaurs just like her big brother. At 7 months old she needed something softer than his hard plastic ones, because the tails might take out her eye. Her brother can use the "Volcano" as a prop when he plays with his own dinosaurs too. His little sister shares. : )
customer_reviews.author: Phyll

customer_reviews.title: Such a great kiddo gift!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for a friend's son's 3rd birthday, along with an educational children's airplane book & a couple dino hot wheel cars. But this was definitely a mega hit!!! The dino's were perfect gripping size for play, and Jace was even able to identify & name what kind even dino was. He played with them for the rest for the party. I also loved that the volcano served as a traveling case, especially since his parents are divorced and share custody. Perfect for transportation.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Dylicious

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddler grandson
customer_reviews.text: My 2-1/2 year old grandson loves dinosaurs and this was perfect for him. He loves putting the dinosaurs in their cave and playing make believe with the different stuffed dinosaurs. Soft and easy for his little hands. The only issue was a small wire poking out on the bottom of the cave near the zipper. I cut it but also cut some of the fur. I put some scotch tape over the spot. There was no way I could send it back after he saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S

customer_reviews.title: It seems well made and I love the cute cuddly features they gave to these dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! My 9 year old daughter loves dinosaurs and has spent the past two years learning as much as she can about them. She loves this gift. She calls them her dinosaur babies. It seems well made and I love the cute cuddly features they gave to these dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Huber

customer_reviews.title: Unique Safe and Special
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is obsessed with dinosaurs. I searched Amazon and found this gem of a toy. This is the most ingenious, cuddly and inviting collection housed in a soft volcano. I’m giving it to her for her third birthday in a couple of weeks and I know she will be delighted, but I want to keep it!!! I showed it to her dad and he just loved it. He said he knows it will be her carry-on when they air travel. My granddaughter has a vivid imagination and this will give her hours of creative play. Can’t say enough ....but congratulations on this winner.
customer_reviews.author: Reva

customer_reviews.title: Volcano full of stuffed dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 2 year old great grand-daughter that is fascinated by dinosaurs. I thought it looked very safe and adorable when I saw it. Sent it to her and she LOVES it. Soft "volcano" that zips up has a handle for little hands to easily carry, with 5 small stuffed different specie dinosaurs in it. So glad I purchased it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LRM216

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My son is obsessed with all things dinosaurs. He had "hard" figurines that he insisted on sleeping with. We purchased this soft collection and he loves them even better than his other ones. Great quality and the zip up volcano is perfect for travel, which is great because he refuses to leave without them. A+
customer_reviews.author: A Bosco

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: This set is nicely made and perfect for a young child (grandson is 11 months old now). It's a great idea to include the volcano for both playing and storage purposes. I think he's going to have a lot of fun with this for many months to come. My daughter worries about the toxicity of plastic items, so this was a good choice for her family.
customer_reviews.author: BookLady

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I had no problems with delivery speed or quality. I bought this for a 2 year old and he really likes it. The dinosaurs are not too small and are very cute. I like the volcano case, it adds to the play experience. I recommend this for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: melee357

customer_reviews.title: ☆☆☆☆☆Perfect Dino Stuffies! ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described, super cute and very soft, perfect for our little nephew for Christmas! I cannot express how much I love the design and texture, especially the volcano house to store the dinosaurs in. ♡ Thank you for such a great product, I'd give it ten stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Quality and softness!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and super soft plush dinosaurs! The volcano house looks a little silly to me, but I love that it holds all the plushes. We gave this as a gift and were able to use the volcano house to hold a book and a pair of pajamas as well. So cute!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Baluha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love dinosaurs right now, and this was a perfect Christmas present for my 4yo....and was even coveted by her 2yo and 6yo sisters. Everyone loves the “dinosaur house” and the dinos included are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Adorable present
customer_reviews.text: This was adorable. I got it for my nephew for his 2nd birthday. He loves dinosaurs. He was a little confused by the volcano when he opened the wrapping (because he is 2 and has no idea what a volcano is). Then he unzipped the door and was soooooooo happy when all the little Dino’s came out. He carried them around in their “house” and didn’t want any more presents lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and a quick favorite in our house!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves dinos of all sorts, and I bought this on a whim when it showed up in a search. He instantly adored it and totes it all over the house. Every night he has to have all 5 dinosaurs and their "volcano" with him to go to sleep. The stuffed animals are very soft, a good size to snuggle, and easily fit inside of the volcano. The zipper is easy for a kid to use and there is a little loop on top, making it easy to carry. I already know if we lose one of these dinos, we will just rebuy the whole set. Too cute to pass up!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable and good quality. Got it for a baby’s first birthday and he loves them and also does his mom. It looks really good quality and not cheap at all, really worth the money. Also it is bigger that I was expecting which makes it even better.
customer_reviews.author: Daileen Vera

customer_reviews.title: Soft Dinosaur Fun
customer_reviews.text: This will be given to our 2 year old grandson so we don't yet know his reaction. For us, we are pleased with the size of the plush items and the Volcano house. The plush dinosaurs are well made, soft, easily stay standing and have good detail and color. This toy is a great way to introduce dinosaurs to little ones and for toddlers and up it encourages imagination and interactive play. I believe this is one of those enduring toys that will stay a favorite for years.
customer_reviews.author: Back in Business

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little fingers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1 and 3 year old nephews who love dinosaurs. They are perfect for them. They had so much fun with them. Only issue was the box was crushed but they didn’t seem to care.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Mom

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and packaged in a clear plastic bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and packaged in a clear plastic bag. Initially I was worried because the bag was compressed and I was concerned that parts were missing. Nope! Everything present, vacuum sealed. My 2 year old loves it, has been playing with it nonstop. He's identifying the dinosaurs by color and learning to clean up by putting them away. The mountain has enough room for some of his other stuffies as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy, my kids loved it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy, my 6 & 3 year old both loved it! Super fun & they were able to fit even more small stuffed animals inside ... bigger then I expected I will say ... highly recommend though
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME GIFT IDEA
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 4 yr old grandson (who, btw is very in to dinosaurs!) for Easter! It was a huge hit. He takes it to bed with him each night so he can play quietly in the morning with his 5 new friends, until everyone else is up. He absolutely loves everything about this gift. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: 2busy

customer_reviews.title: Dinosaur heaven
customer_reviews.text: My 3yr old grandson loves dinosaurs and stuffed animals! This was the perfect gift for him that I've come across. All the animals are well made and the volcano is a perfect home for all of them, however the zipper was a little difficult at first for him. Would definitely recommend for all dinosaur lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything was just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my nephew’s 2nd birthday. He is sleeping with the entire set and is guarding the whole thing with his life! Just perfect. Thanks for this! You have made us ALL super happy 🥳🤗!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carol

customer_reviews.title: Children Excited
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaur toys were for me granddaughter and grandson for their birthdays. They each loves their gift. My 6year old granddaughter loves the small dinosaurs in the volcano. My 4 year old grandson has been sleeping with Trex every night. Both toys have been big hits for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Great Dinosaur
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for upr grandson. Product looked good and durable on website and liked the volcano carrier. Toys were of a good size and seem to be well made, carrier works great and 4 year old grandson uses it all the time .
customer_reviews.author: SnarkAZ

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great quality, awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this toy!! These are really cute and soft dinosaurs with a great volcano-carrying case - I’ve bought similar toys from National Parks that were (naturally) twice the price. (Bought this one for $20.) So very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Train mama

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy to hold on to
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaurs are small enough for little hands to hold on to. Bought this as a birthday gift for a 1 year old, and he loved them. It comes in a sealed plastic bag, which was a bit of a bummer when I had to wrap it. I would've preferred a box.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Product made great! Thanks, Maggie
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product as does our vets 3 yr. old daughter that we got them for...she goes nowhere without them and counts to five to make sure they are all in the volcano!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Fun Dino's!
customer_reviews.text: I have to tell you, these Dinosaurs are Amazingly cute! I bought them for my nephew for Christmas. When I received them, I couldn't help but break them out of the bag and show them to everyone in my house. They can be a lot of fun. Haha. I will definitely be buying these again for future little humans in my life. That way I get to play with them again!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Zenon

customer_reviews.title: Love the volcano carrying case!
customer_reviews.text: The these dinosaurs and their valcano are well made. They dinosaurs are small enough for little hands but not so small they are a choking hazard. My 2 year old grandson was able to easily open and close the valcano without assistance. It is also the right size for him to carry without help.
customer_reviews.author: KT Lou

customer_reviews.title: Toys for Young Dino-Lovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10-month-old grandson who is too young for plastic dinosaurs with sharper edges. The plush toys are perfect! He loves to put them into and take out of the storage volcano. The toys seem to be very well made and very safe for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: great find! high quality stuffed toys for a great price
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old asked Santa for a dinosaur for Christmas and this is what was left under the tree for her. She LOVES it. The dinosaurs are really cute and the perfect size for her. Everything seems to be very well made and is very soft. She takes them to bed with her she loves them so much. The cave is really cute too and they can all fit nicely inside. This was a great find!
customer_reviews.author: JessR

customer_reviews.title: 5 Grandsons have a passion for dinosaurs
customer_reviews.text: The dinosaurs are cute. They are soft and fun to put away. Not to mention super portable. And there are 5 of them! Can’t wait for my little guys to see them!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Snyder

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this set! The dinos could be ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this set! The dinos could be a little bigger, but he really enjoys them! The volcano home is a really cute idea. I would give these as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Renae G.

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this volcano/dino house! He takes it everywhere he goes! He has additional dinos that he has added to this set. In total he can fit the 13 plush dinosaurs inside the volcano. This came with 5 dinosaurs and he has 8 others around the same size as the ones that came with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toy good to take traveling being Dino’s come in their own ...
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler loves putting dino’s back in cave to go night-night after playing “ what type of Dino”. Toy good to take traveling being Dino’s come in their own case with handle. Made nicely. Makes learning imaginative.
customer_reviews.author: gatormum64

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much!
customer_reviews.text: These dinosaur plushies are so adorable! They all arrived in great shape and they fit nicely in their volcano case. We bought this for our 1 year old and are planning to give it to him in a few months for Christmas. I think he’ll love it and probably take to it even more as he gets a little older. Everything is well-made and so cute!
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Kids LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: This Dino “house” is a complete success with our kiddos! In fact, I bought a second set for a child who saw his cousin’s!! The entire set is so well made and durable! The Dino’s are so cute, soft and cuddly... our 5 yr old slept with a fav (or 2)!! A good buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue M Scott

customer_reviews.title: This is so adorable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I was purchasing this I knew that it might be cheaply made since it's priced well for five dinosaurs plus a carrying pouch....I was SO wrong! This is the cutest toy! The dinosaurs are very well made as is the volcano. They are so cute and I can't stop playing with them!!! This came as is with no packaging at all but I tied some curling ribbon on the top loop and it was all ready for gift giving! If you have a tiny dinosaur lover to buy for, this is an awesome choice!
customer_reviews.author: April5683

customer_reviews.title: Di no mite!
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift. Birthday boy loved it as did all the kids aged 1-9 at his party. Nice toy to take to Gramma’s as it packs up all the dinosaurs in the volcano.
customer_reviews.author: Dee M.

customer_reviews.title: Original and cute.
customer_reviews.text: This original and cute. It is soft and easy for younger kids to play with. It is also easy to put away by putting everything in the volcano house.
customer_reviews.author: ckrug

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my best friend's son's 4th birthday. He loved it. A few months later she asked him what to get for his cousin's birthday. He insisted that they get her this. She loved it. And to be honest, it was so cute that I kind of wanted to keep it for myself!
customer_reviews.author: LinAbby

customer_reviews.title: Well made and too cute.....
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the size of the dinosaurs, I was worried they would be very small but they are a good size for small hands and large enough enough to catch and hold a child’s attention. The only thing I wish was different is we received two of the blue dinosaurs and no green..... but they are well made and very cute. Would recommend to any interested party.
customer_reviews.author: MLW

customer_reviews.title: Cutest Dinos Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute idea. My nephew loves dinosaurs so this was perfect for his first birthday. Love that you can stick them all in their home for cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Annie C

customer_reviews.title: To cute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves dinasours so this looked. It turned out perfect she puts them in the cave and drags it around. It’s just to cute. I worry a little bit about the eyes not being on as well as is like but it really is nice
customer_reviews.author: Syler

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our Grandson
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson had fun immediately playing with the plush dinosaurs and putting them on his bed. The seller also boxed it well and it arrived as promised in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne E. Duren

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's room has a dinosaur theme, so this looked like a great find. I bought this for his first birthday party. Although he was having a blast playing with the empty boxes and gift bags from his party, all the adults just loved this gift. LOL. I know he'll have lots of fun with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew that had a grandmal seizure in September which caused serious brain damage. He loved dinosaurs before this and this product is great for him to learn to hold things again and he can't get hurt on them. He was so excited to get them and reached for them when his Grandma was playing with him and them. They are made beautifully and I hope this helps with his healing.
customer_reviews.author: Sharmer

customer_reviews.title: Every child loves dinosaurs.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my toddler grandson and he loves it. He has it in mom's car and it keeps him busy when the ride is long. To a toddler any ride is long.
customer_reviews.author: junus

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old daughter LOVES THIS! She called the volcano there house and they sleep there!! Great quality and the Dino’s are perfect size for little hands!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Different kind of toy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a gift for my 2-year old nephew that was more creative than Thomas the Train or Lion Guard. Found this on Amazon and he loved it! Not only is it adorable, it allows for creative play. Quality product, too!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Carraway

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 2 year old great nephew, who is really into dinosaurs at the moment. When I saw this on Amazon I knew it was just the right gift. When I received it I couldn't wait to open it, and I was not disappointed! The dinosaurs are a very nice size and the volcano is the perfect carrying case. I can't wait for him to open it (3 more days) and I know he'll LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: And is so loved by my grandson
customer_reviews.text: This Dinosaur House is made so well as are the dinosaurs. Soft and colorful. And is so loved by my grandson. It is fun for a toddler to be able to take the dinosaurs out of their home (the cave) and put them to sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SIZE & SHAPE FOR TODDLER HANDS
customer_reviews.text: I found some other "Dinosaur Volcano Houses" listed on Amazon, but this one was a really nice size. The others were smaller and the dinosaurs much smaller. The pictures shown with the dimensions of the volcano and dinosaurs sold me on this product and when I got it in person I could see it was made of quality materials and the zipper was easy to open and close. My grandchild loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi E. MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy for the little one
customer_reviews.text: The perfect toy for my Grandson who loves dinosaurs. I got it for him for Christmas and the portability and assortment of dinosaurs were spot on.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the the sea animal set for my granddaughters and dinosaurs for my 8 month old grandson. This set is adorable, well made and such a great idea. It is so colorful and the volcano holder is such a great idea. Not only does my grandson and granddaughters love this set; the adults love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Mom3

customer_reviews.title: Right size for little hands
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Easy for a toddler to carry. All the adults thought the same thing, it looks more like a 💩 than a volcano.lololo I do wish the eyes had been embroidery instead of plastic. But it was just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: jpgr1961

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old nephew who is obsessed with dinosaurs loved these! They are high quality and adorable. The "volcano" could use a bit of re-styling but overall, it was a perfect Christmas present!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Item was a little bigger than I expected but great for my nephew
customer_reviews.text: Item was a little bigger than I expected but great for my nephew. Saving it for his second birthday but I already know it’ll be a hit! The dinosaurs are very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Ms J

customer_reviews.title: My niece absolutely loved this gift
customer_reviews.text: My niece absolutely loved this gift! The dinosaurs are a good size for toddlers and young children to play with. She loved playing with the volcano, and I loved that it was an easy way to clean up and keep everything together. Now we don't have to worry about dinosaurs getting left behind!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

Beast Christmas Gift For Kids Of All Ages Your Little Dino Lover Will Not Let Them Go
